data.title: Edge Hill University
data.meta_description: Edge Hill, Ofsted Outstanding Provider for ITE, is a campus university in Lancashire (near Liverpool), offering a range of undergrad, postgrad & research courses.
data.text:
A life in design

/news/2024/08/a-life-in-design/

Edge Hill University's new Graphic Design degree has been developed with professional insight. The course leaders talk to us about their belief in the power of great, sustainable graphic design.

post

Fastrack history and politics student graduates from Edge Hill with career-boosting accolades and experience

/news/2024/08/fastrack-course-as-the-route-to-a-degree-edge-hill-university/

History and politics student Lewis Melville graduates after taking Edge Hill’s Fastrack course as the route to a degree.

post

PGCE the next step for education and religion graduate who juggled studying, being a carer and personal health challenges

/news/2024/08/education-and-religion-graduate-juggled-studying-being-a-carer-and-personal-health-challenges-edge-hill-university/

Education and religion graduate Kate Jarnell is excited to continue her studies at Edge Hill – a university with a strong community that's supported her through family health and personal challenges.

post

Craft cider is surprisingly good for the environment

/news/2024/08/environmental-impact-of-cider-edge-hill-university/

In a new article for The Conversation, Ufuk Alpsahin Cullen, Senior Lecturer in Entrepreneurship and Research Fellow at Edge Hill University, explores the environmental impact of cider.

post

Edge Hill law student makes dream debut for St Helens RLFC and plays in front of bumper Super League crowd

/news/2024/08/edge-hill-law-student-makes-dream-debut-for-st-helens-rlfc-and-plays-in-front-of-bumper-super-league-crowd/

AN Edge Hill University student who juggles a professional rugby league career with studying law has told of the moment his childhood dream came true.

post

Single mum of three adds teaching diploma to her impressive CV, proving it's never too late to change careers

/news/2024/07/graduate-shauntelle-riley-edge-hill-university/

Graduate Shauntelle Riley has embarked on a teaching career, a Postgraduate Diploma (Further Education and Skills) is the latest addition to an impressive CV of qualifications and experience.

post

‘Changemaker’ former MP calls on students to make the world a better place

/news/2024/07/changemaker-former-mp-calls-on-students-to-make-the-world-a-better-place/

Trailblazing former MP Louise Ellman has urged graduating students to “make the world a better place”.

post

Mum of four embarks on a new career in further education, emboldened by Edge Hill's top-rated teacher training

/news/2024/07/rehmatun-mohtat-completes-qualification-at-49-edge-hill-university/

Postgraduate Diploma in Teaching graduate Rehmatun Mohtat is proving it's never too late for a new career direction, completing her latest qualification at 49 years old.

post

Edge Hill University shortlisted in three categories for Green Gown Awards 2024

/news/2024/07/edge-hill-university-shortlisted-in-three-categories-for-green-gown-awards-2024/

Edge Hill University has been recognised for its commitment to sustainability with three finalist spots in the Green Gown Awards.
